title: College of Medicine -MD- Immunization Requirements | University Health Services | UC College of Medicine
cleaned_text: include the following: Your immunization requirements include: Hepatitis B: 3 Hepatitis B vaccine doses OR 2 Heplisav-B doses AND Hepatitis B surface antibody (HBSAB) titer* A (Meningococcal Quadrivalent): One dose if you are 16 to 21 years of age. Dose must be given on/after 16th birthday. Tuberculosis: IGRA blood test (QuantiFERON or T-Spot) OR a two-step Tuberculin skin tests placed 7-21 days apart Tdap (Tetanus, Diphtheria, Acellular Pertussis): One dose given within the past 10 years. Varicella: 2 vaccine doses OR Varicella antibody (VZVIgG) titer* Influenza (flu): required each fall when vaccine becomes available Covid-19 (Third Party Requirement): primary series of one bivalent or two monovalent vaccines * A titer is a laboratory test that measures the presence and amount of antibodies in blood. A titer may be used to prove immunity to disease. Visit medproctor.com and click "Register for a New Account." Use your University of Cincinnati email address. You can obtain the immunization form here or click on the University of Cincinnati Required Form tab. Upload your completed immunization form to Med+Proctor. You will receive an email confirmation from Med+Proctor once the forms have been reviewed. Tips and Information for Successful Upload of Records: Richard E. Lindner Center2751 O'Varsity Way,
